settings.title: We know you're gonna love these products as much as we do!
settings.content: Check out our Worry-free Guarantee

settings.title: Hi! We've been connecting families through gentle body care basics for little ones. Good, clean fun since 2014.
From Our Family to Yours
settings.content:
I‚Äôm Andrea Faulkner Williams. I created Tubby Todd as a gentle solution for our family‚Äôs sensitive skin. For years we struggled with dryness and eczema, and smooth skin always seemed impossibly out of reach. It was frustrating spending money on yet another product that wasn‚Äôt helpful, clean, or safe for our little ones.

Out of those discouragements came a drive and passion to create our own clean, bath products, and we spent years developing and testing them in our own home. We‚Äôve since grown Tubby Todd into an entire line of body care basics with natural extracts that have worked miracles for our family and became the solution we had been looking for all those years.

Tubby Todd is all about good, clean fun for the whole family. We created Tubby Todd with sensitive-skinned babies in mind, and each product works hard to nourish, hydrate, and gently soothe skin from head to toe.

We love that after a spaghetti disaster or a messy day on the playground, bath time gives us a fresh new start. We‚Äôve created this gentle line of bodycare basics to help keep you and your little ones clean, fresh, and moisturized all day long. We hope your family feels the same joy from these products as we do. Now let‚Äôs get Tubby!


xx,
Andrea

settings.title: The Courage to Start a Soap Brand
What is a mineral sunscreen?
settings.answer: Sunscreens use either chemical active ingredients or minerals. Our formulas contain mineral active ingredients (zinc oxide and titanium oxide). The mineral ingredients reflect the sun's rays like a mirror to protect exposed skin.

settings.title: What does Broad Spectrum mean?
settings.answer: There are two types of UV light that can harm your skin ‚Äî UVA and UVB. A broad-spectrum sunscreen protects you from both.

settings.title: What are the active ingredients in Sunscreen, Sunstick and Mineral Mist?
settings.answer:
+ Zinc Oxide 7% (Sunscreen), Zinc Oxide 20% (Sunstick), Zinc Oxide 15.7% (Mineral Mist)

+ Titanium Dioxide 5% (Sunscreen) Titanium Dioxide 3.4% (Mineral Mist)

+ Titanium dioxide is an Inert earth mineral used as a thickening, whitening, lubricating, ingredient in sunscreen. It protects skin from UVA and UVB radiation and is considered no risk of skin sensitivity.

+ Zinc oxide is a powdered mineral that sits on top of the skin, scattering, reflecting, and absorbing UVA & UVB rays.

settings.title: How often should I be putting sunscreen on?
settings.answer: Sunscreen should be applied 15 minutes before sun exposure to allow the ingredients to fully bind to the skin. Reapplication of sunscreen is just as important as putting it on in the first place, so reapply the same amount every 80 minutes.

settings.title: What times of day should we put sunscreen on?
settings.answer: Seek shade when appropriate, remembering that the sun's rays are strongest between 10 a.m. and 2 p.m. If your shadow is shorter than you are, seek shade.

settings.title: What is the best SPF to be using?
settings.answer: Dermatologists recommend using a sunscreen with an SPF of at least 30, which blocks 97 percent of the sun's UVB rays.

settings.title: Where should my sunscreen be stored?
settings.answer:
To keep your sunscreen in good condition, we recommend that sunscreen containers should not be exposed to direct sun. Protect your sunscreen by wrapping in a towel or keeping them in the shade (cooler) while outside for long periods of time.

Mineral Mist should also not be exposed to direct sun or excessive heat. This innovative packaging does not contain propellant gasses like traditional aerosol cans, but contains highly pressurized air so be careful to store in a place where the can cannot be punctured or incinerated.

settings.title: How old should my baby be to use sunscreen?
settings.answer: Younger babies should use other forms of sun protection. If your baby is 6 months or older, liberally use sunscreen.

settings.title: Are these sunscreens safe for faces?
settings.answer:
Yes! Both our Mineral Sunscreen and Sunstick are safe for faces, but Sunstick makes the application even easier! Make sure to rub both sunscreens all the way in to avoid getting it in the eyes.

Mineral Mist is also safe for the face, but should be sprayed into the hands and then applied instead of spraying directly onto the face.

settings.title: How do you apply sunscreen?
settings.answer:
+ Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure

+ For best application, rub, rub rub!

+ Reapply after 80 minutes of sweating & swimming OR every 2 hours

settings.title: Are your sunscreens water resistant?
settings.answer: Tubby Sunscreen, Sunstick and Mineral Mist are water resistant for 80 minutes.

settings.title: Are Tubby SPF Products Reef Safe?
settings.answer: Tubby Sunscreen, Sunstick and Mineral Mist are Coral Reef Friendly. Sunscreen washes off your body when swimming and enters the marine environment. Common chemical sunscreen ingredients, such as oxybenzone and octinoxate, can kill coral and damage coral reefs. Tubby SPF products do not have any of these harmful ingredients and they are safe for coral reefs.

settings.title: What is the difference between adult and child sunscreen?
settings.answer: The difference between a sunscreen made for children and adults and a regular adult sunscreen is the ingredients used to prevent the effects of the sun's rays. Baby sunscreen uses titanium dioxide or zinc oxide to form a physical barrier against the sun's rays; these ingredients are not absorbed into the skin and are better for little ones.

settings.title: Does the Sunscreen, Sunstick or Mineral Mist have a scent?
settings.answer: No, there is no scent to our sunscreens.

settings.title: Do Mineral Sunscreen and Sunstick rub in?
settings.answer: In order to create an effective safe barrier between your little one and UV rays, we have created three safe mineral sunscreens. The good news is after years of formulation and testing, we have come up with formulas that will not leave your little ones' skin white and sticky. For best use, squeeze a dollop of Sunscreen in your hand and rub, rub, rub. For our sunstick, apply liberally to little faces and use your hands to rub it in (avoiding the eyes). Mineral Mist rubs in easily as well and can be sprayed directly onto arms, legs, chest and back, leaving no white cast and no sticky residue. Remember to spray into the hands before applying to little ones' faces.

settings.title: What is the shelf life?
settings.answer: All Tubby Todd products have a shelf life of two years.

settings.title: What does it mean that Mineral Mist is in a non-aerosol can? What is a continuous spray?
settings.answer: Traditional spray sunscreens rely on propellant gasses like aerosol to dispense the formula from the packaging. Mineral Mist‚Äôs innovative ‚Äúbag on valve‚Äù packaging means that the actual sunscreen is stored in an airless bag surrounded by pressurized air that pushes the product out the dispenser when applicator button is pressed. This specific packaging is extra hygienic, offers an even mist/spray for easy application AND ensures you get to use every last drop of sunscreen!

settings.title: How should I store the Mineral Mist?
settings.answer: Even though Mineral Mist does not contain any aerosols, the air is still pressurized within the can and should be protected from excessive heat, direct sunlight, and should not be stored in a place where it can be punctured or incinerated.

settings.title: Why does the Mineral Mist contain Titanium Dioxide?
settings.answer: Zinc Oxide as a raw ingredient is a larger molecule than Titanium Dioxide, and thus more difficult to propel. Supplementing Zinc Oxide with Titanium Dioxide allows the formula to disperse more evenly from the can without risk of clogging, which would occur if we used just Zinc Oxide by itself. Both Zinc and Titanium Oxide in this formula are non-nano.

settings.title: Are your products safe for sensitive skin?
settings.answer:
Yes! We have worked extensively with partners that we trust to bring your family safe, clean and effective solutions for your little one's sensitive skin.

But you definitely don't need to have sensitive skin to use Tubby Todd. Our products are great for any skin type!

settings.title: What is the best age range to use Tubby Todd products?
settings.answer: Tubby Todd is great for the whole family!

settings.title: Do your products contain parabens?
settings.answer: Nope, not at all, not even one! In place of parabens, we've used natural, plant-based preservatives like Honeysuckle Extract to prevent the growth of bacteria and mold. (You‚Äôre welcome!)

settings.title: Are your products organic?
settings.answer: Our products are non toxic and typically include at least several ingredients that are organic. Our Baby Massage Oil, Chest Rub, and Nipple Balm are all USDA certified organic.

settings.title: Are your products gluten free?
settings.answer: Our ingredients do not contain oats or gluten. We have full ingredient lists on each product page of our website for you to double-check! Our manufacturing lines are cleaned and sanitized between production runs, but we do not have final testing to make sure that there aren't traces of allergens in the product.

settings.title: Are your products safe to use during pregnancy?
settings.answer: Our products are specifically built for moms and moms to be, but we always recommend consulting your doctor before using any skincare products while pregnant or breastfeeding.

settings.title: Are your products tear free?
settings.answer: Our wash and soap products are formulated with gentle ingredients but we recommend avoiding the eyes as much as possible!

settings.title: Are your products tested on animals?
settings.answer: Nope, never. We are proud to be 100% animal cruelty-free, certified by the Leaping Bunny Foundation.

settings.title: Are your products EWG verified?
settings.answer: We are not verified by the EWG today, but we pay close attention to their standards as we develop our products. We also follow the Whole Foods Premium Body Care standards and Natural Products Association Natural Personal Care Guidelines.

settings.title: Are your fragrances natural?
settings.answer: Yes! All fragrances in our products are comprised only of aromatic natural raw materials, which are custom blends of pure essential oils and extracts. They are completely free from nature-identical and synthetic components.

settings.title: What should I do if my baby accidentally swallows some product?
settings.answer: Our products are non-toxic, so there's no need to worry if some was ingested. That said, we recommend checking in with your pediatrician if you are concerned.

settings.title: How do I get notified if an item is back in stock?
settings.answer:
Our seasonal scents and brand collaborations are only available while supplies last, so get them while you can.

To the extent we are out of a core product, please email us at customercare@tubbytodd.com and our team can let you know when we will be back in stock.

settings.title: Is there an expiration date on your products?
settings.answer: We recommend that they be used within 2 years of purchase or 6 months after opening for best product quality. (But we think you‚Äôll love them so much that this won‚Äôt even be an issue!) Note that natural variations in texture and color are normal, since each product is formulated with natural ingredients.

settings.title: I have heard that lavender is bad for you. Is that true?
settings.answer: We conduct extensive research and testing to ensure our products are safe and effective. The experts that we have worked with have not highlighted any safety concerns with lavender or any of our other ingredients, particularly in the small concentrations utilized in our products. That said, if you are concerned, please consult your pediatrician.

settings.title: How do I qualify for Free Shipping on my order?
settings.answer:
We offer free standard shipping on any order that totals $50 before taxes and after discounts and is shipping within the 48 contiguous U.S. states. For Alaska and Hawaii, the threshold for free shipping is $60, and for Canada, the threshold for free shipping is $75 USD. At this time, we are unable to offer free shipping to other locations regardless of the threshold.

Please keep in mind that your subtotal needs to be $50+ (or $60 or $75 as appropriate) AFTER any rewards, discounts, or promotion codes are applied.

If you have any questions about your shipping charges please reach out to us!

settings.title: How do I track my order?
settings.answer:
Immediately after purchase, you should receive an email with your order number and shipping status.

Please allow 1-3 business days for your order to ship due to processing time.

Once the carrier updates the shipping status, you can track your order from our warehouse to your door.

You can also check the status of your order by signing in to your account at tubbytodd.com.

If you're having issues, please don't hesitate to contact us at customercare@tubbytodd.com.

settings.title: Can I edit my order? I want to add something before it ships.
settings.answer: Orders are pulled for packing and shipping immediately after being placed. You can email us at customercare@tubbytodd.com and we'll do our best to help but we can't guarantee any modifications can be made.

settings.title: How can I edit my shipping address?
settings.answer: Email us at customercare@tubbytodd.com as soon as possible after placing your order and we'll try to catch it before it ships! Unfortunately, we cannot guarantee any modifications can be made.

settings.title: I changed my mind. Can I cancel my order?
settings.answer: Please email us at customercare@tubbytodd.com as soon as possible and we'll do our best to help you cancel your order if it hasn't shipped yet.

settings.title: Where does Tubby Todd ship?
settings.answer: We ship internationally to Canada and anywhere within the US! (Shipping fees may vary).

settings.title: Can I use multiple promo codes?
settings.answer: Only one promo code can be used at checkout.

settings.title: My order says it was delivered, but I never received it.
settings.answer: We‚Äôre so sorry! Unfortunately, we cannot be responsible for the package once it leaves our hands, but we will do our best to help you. Contact your local USPS post office or FedEx; sometimes they mark packages undeliverable and you‚Äôll need to pick it up in person. Our system automatically red-flags any incorrect addresses, but sometimes invalid addresses slip through the cracks and become undeliverable, so be sure to email us at customercare@tubbytodd.com ASAP if your shipping address is incorrect.

settings.title: Can I return an opened product?
settings.answer:
We have a worry-free guarantee that is simple and straightforward: We want you to love our products as much as we do. If you're not 100% satisfied with your purchase, don't worry! You can return your item for a full refund within 30 days of the delivery date.

Please note: your original shipping charges, if any, will not be refunded. All returns must be shipped to us at your own expense; we cannot accept packages shipped C.O.D. Once the original product(s) are received at Tubby Todd, you will receive a credit in the amount that you paid in the form of your original payment. Please allow ~10 business days for Tubby Todd to refund your account upon receipt.

settings.title: Can I return an unopened product?
settings.answer:
If you simply happen to change your mind about a purchase, we encourage re-gifting! You may also return the unused, unopened product to us within 60 days of receipt and we'll refund you the full purchase price.

Please note: your original shipping charges, if any, will not be refunded. All returns must be shipped to us at your own expense; we cannot accept packages shipped C.O.D. Once the original product(s) are received at Tubby Todd, you will receive a credit in the amount that you paid in the form of your original payment. Please allow ~10 business days for Tubby Todd to refund your account upon receipt.

settings.title: What should I do if I received the wrong product?
settings.answer: If you received a product that‚Äôs different from the one you originally ordered, we‚Äôre sorry about that! Email us at customercare@tubbytodd.com and we‚Äôll get the correct product sent out to you as soon as possible.

settings.title: What makes Tubby Todd different from other children‚Äôs bath soaps?
settings.answer: We‚Äôre a small, family-owned business, and each and every Tubby Todd purchase, social media share, and baby shower gift you give means the world to us. We‚Äôve spent years formulating the perfect, natural products for sensitive skin, and will always be toxin, paraben, sulfate, artificial fragrance, BPA, and animal-cruelty free. We can‚Äôt wait for you to try them and get tubby with us!

settings.title: Where are your products made?
settings.answer: Tubby Todd is formulated, manufactured, and distributed right here in the USA.

settings.title: Do you offer samples?
settings.answer: Sample packets are in the works so check back with us soon!

settings.promise_description: We're passionate about making products that really work! Every product we make is not only gentle and safe for sensitive skin, but is impressively effective at getting the job done.

settings.title: Testimonials
settings.disclaimer: The testimonies shared here are the personal experiences and opinions of the consumers writing them. Our products are not intended to treat or cure a medical condition. They heal, treat, eliminate, and prevent dry skin and conditions resulting from extremely dry skin. Suitable for eczema prone skin.
settings.default_featured_review_1: ...Tubby Todd is so gentle on his skin and smells so yummy! It is the most perfect delicate scent!...
settings.default_featured_review_2: Smells amazing, and leaves my baby girl's skin so soft! We will definitely be buying more!

settings.title: Ingredients
settings.intro: We believe natural products don't have to be stinky, sticky, or stuffy. We're all about good, clean fun‚Äîdown to our nitty-gritty ingredients. We follow good manufacturing practices to make sure ingredients are cleanly sourced, animal cruelty-free, and as safe as possible for you and your little ones. Here's a look at what exactly's in your favorite Tubby Todd products bubbled in the U.S.A:

settings.title: Give yourself a Mama Minute with some good, clean, downloadable fun for your little one!
Your Unique Link Is Where the Magic Happens
settings.text: Share your unique link to give friends a 10% discount at checkout (discount applied automatically). With every completed purchase made through your link, you will receive a 10% commission!

settings.title: Here's How to Share (although let's be honest, you're probably a pro already!)
settings.text:
Chances are if you're here, you already share about Tubby Todd to anyone who will listen! Not an Insta influencer? Not a problem! While many of our mamas do share about TT on their IG feed and stories, there are tons of other ways to spread the bubbly love far and wide. Here are just a few fav ways to share:

+ Get creative with your social media channels! Instagram is great but remember Facebook? Still a fantastic way to connect with friends. Are you a cool mom on Tik Tok? Dance out your love for Tubby Todd and share that link mama.

+ Tell your friends and family. Wait, just tell them? YES! Just tell them! If you know someone who is really serious about clean ingredients or whose kiddos struggle with sensitive skin‚Äîshoot them a text or give them a good ol' fashioned phone call!

+ Email any mamas-to-be in your life who might be putting together baby registries because bath products are important too!

settings.title: Let's Start with The Regs
settings.text:
Meet The Regulars Bundle featuring 3 of our staple TT products to help care for all skin types, even sensitive skin that might be prone to eczema, cradle cap or dryness.

+ Hair & Body Wash A pure, hypoallergenic wash that really lathers like it matters!Everyday Lotion

+ A thick & creamy everyday moisturizer!All Over Ointment

+ A balm for everything!

settings.title: Hi! We're so glad you're here
settings.intro: Our Mamas Who Know ambassador program is a community dedicated to one thing: spreading the Tubby Todd love! We're here to help you share the best bodycare basics for little ones with your friends, family and mama tribe. Let's get ready to have some good, clean fun!

settings.title: Name: Karissa
settings.text:
Introduce yourself: I‚Äôm Karissa, a boy mom of 2, full time content creator/blogger and aspiring postpartum doula from Southern California.

When did you start using TT and why?
I started using Tubby Todd after my first developed really dry/sensitive skin on his face as a baby. We love it so much I use many of the products on my own skin (especially the All Over Ointment).

What's your fave part of the Tubby Todd Mama community?
I love being part of the Tubby Todd Mama community because you can never have too many mom friends in your life, especially when they love Tubby Todd as much as you do :)

settings.title: Name: Eva
settings.text:
Introduce yourself: My name is Eva M. Collado. I am a Latina and I work in the medical research field. I am also a bibliophile, have a passion for crafty DIYs and creating content.

When did you start using TT and why?
I started using TT when I exhausted all options to treat my sons eczema. The all over ointment cream was the only product that worked on his skin gave him any relief. Every since then TT products have been in full consumption at my household.

What's your fave part of the Tubby Todd Mama community?
My favorite part of the TT mama community is that all mamas have one mission and that mission is fulfilled by TT products. TT also provides a sense of community & delight, I am so proud to be a TT mama!

settings.title: Name: Kate
settings.text:
Introduce yourself: Hello, my name is Kate and I'm from Ontario, Canada. I'm a mama of one spunky toddler and I love photography and writing!

When did you start using TT and why?
We started using Tubby Todd when our little one was a baby as I loved the gentle ingredients that it had. I felt that I could trust Tubby Todd and it also helped moisturize our babe's skin so well.

What's your fave part of the Tubby Todd Mama community?
I love that there is a mutual interest for safe gentle skin ingredients and that there is always that support of a strong motherhood community.

settings.title: Meet Some Mamas Who Are Crushin' It!
What is my dashboard?
settings.answer: Your dashboard is your hub for all things Mamas Who Know!

settings.title: Where can I find my unique sharing link?
settings.answer: Within your dashboard!

settings.title: Do I share my unique sharing link or discount code?
settings.answer: Only share your unique link! Your link is what tracks purchases, provides a discount at checkout, and provides you with your commission.

settings.title: What if someone has already shopped at Tubby Todd, can they still shop through my link?
settings.answer: Yes! The 10% discount is good for a one-time use whether the customer is a new or a long-time TT fan!

settings.title: Why do I have a discount code?
settings.answer: You have a personal 10% discount code that you can use up to 12 times per year on your own Tubby Todd purchases. Please do not share this code, it‚Äôs just for you, Mama!

settings.title: How do I get paid my commission?
settings.answer: In order for you to receive your commission payment, you will need to fill out your Paypal and tax document. You can find these details within your dashboard under the SETTINGS tab. Please follow the steps to set up a password.

settings.title: When am I paid my commission?
settings.answer: You are paid your commission for the month prior within the middle of each month.

settings.title: When do we receive Tubby Todd products?
settings.answer: When you join Mamas Who Know, you will receive a Welcome Kit filled with The Regulars Bundle. Two times a year, you will receive a 30% personal discount code, and two times a year you will receive a bubbly product gift.

settings.title: Let's Get Down to the Nitty Gritty
Here's the boring fine print, but we promise to keep mostly to the fun stuff! Read up on all the deets.
Other questions?
settings.text:
Jessica's your gal! Contact her at the email below, she's awesome, we promise.

jessica@tubbytodd.com

settings.title: Meet All Over Ointment!
settings.intro: Say hello to AOO‚Äîa balm for everything! This rich, creamy ointment is made from plant-based extracts like jojoba, honeysuckle, and camellia to naturally moisturize and protect skin. Perfect for eczema-prone or sensitive skin of all types.

settings.title: Name: Melinda V.
settings.text: My little one had baby acne and this was the difference after just two days of use! Amazing product.

settings.title: Name: Kaylin W.
settings.text: This has helped with my babies eczema extremely well! No more breakouts, her skin babysoft, it used to be super rought and dry. This had honestly cleared up every area of eczema. And with being all natural she doesnt have a bad reaction or act like it burns like with most other products!

settings.title: Name: Mimi F.
settings.text: We started using this on his little baby acne and then his cradle cap! It‚Äôs worked wonders and his acne cleared up in a day!!

settings.title: Perfect for eczema-prone or sensitive skin of all types.
settings.text:
+ Fragrance-free
+ Thick texture that's always smooth, never greasy
+ Available in our regular or Extra Tubby size, or take it on-the-go with our Travel 3-pack

settings.title: What's the difference between AOO and our other moisturizers?
settings.text: We're so glad you asked! Click HERE for a little hydration how-to!

settings.title: AOO is made with natural ingredients. Here are a few:
settings.text:
+ Beeswax
+ Mangifera Indica (Mango) Fruit Extract
+ Lonicera Japonica (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract
+ Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Fruit Extract

settings.title:
Good time, bubble time!
Earn credits, gifts, and freebies--all just for shopping.
Build Those Bubbles
settings.referral_text:
Give 10%, Get $10!

Earn bubbles by sharing with your friends! Give them 10% off on their first order and get 1000 Bubbles ($10) for each successful referral.

settings.title: Reap those rewards
settings.text: Convert your Bubbles into Tubby Dollars for some sudsy savings!

settings.title: Have Yourself a Very Tubby Christmas
settings.text: Cranberry Mandarin is back for a fifth year‚Äîit's Tubby Tradition! This year our Very Tubby Christmas collection is available in four products so you can shop this fan-fave scent in all your TT must-haves!

settings.title: A Very Tubby Holiday Collection
settings.intro: Holiday cheer is finally here! Introducing two very special (verrrrry giftable) collections to help you and your little ones bring your bath and skincare routine from blah to fa-la-la-la-la! Tubby Advent and A Very Tubby Christmas feature our staple TT products all dressed up for the season in the most delicious, festive scents!

settings.title: Hello Cranberry Mandarin
settings.text: Make the Holiday season that much more magical with yummy cran man! With hints of tart, fresh picked cranberry and juicy, tangy mandarin orange this bright, punchy scent will fill tub time with Holiday memories while leaving your little one so fresh and so clean.

settings.title: Celebrate the season with Tubby Advent
settings.text: This year's winter seasonal collection in collaboration with Kid Made Modern is all about those special family celebrations leading up to the holidays. These traditions can be so simple and so magical at the same time! The Gift Set includes three festive TT products and the DIY Holiday Advent Calendar by Kid Made Modern to help you create some new traditions to celebrate the season with your little ones.

settings.title: Yummiest Holiday Scents
settings.text:
+ Winter Mint Everyday Lotion: This deliciously wintery scent is the perfect blend of vanilla swirled with cool peppermint and pure spearmint.

+ Pomegranate Cr√®me Hair + Body Wash: Yummy notes of zesty citrus, tart pomegranate and rosewood this wash is perfect to keep by the tub or sink as a super simple way to bring a little Holiday cheer into your space.

+ Gingerbread Bubble Bath: Hints of juicy tangerine, spicy clove, cinnamon and vanilla this BB smells just like a batch of sweet, savory gingerbread cookies fresh out of the oven. YUM!

settings.title: Tubby Holiday Gifting Guide
settings.intro: Tis the season to spread bubbly Holiday cheer to your nearest and dearest.

settings.title: For the stocking:
settings.intro: Stuff your little one's stocking with sudsy, fizzy fun and skincare staples of their very own!

settings.title: For Out-of-Town Friends:
settings.intro: Send the gift of Tubby to all your long distance friends and family with these fave Sets (packaged in our signature gift box!).

settings.title: For Stocking Up:
settings.intro: Get your own fam set for the season by saving almost 15% when you stock up on Extra Tubby sizes.

settings.title: For Essential Workers (AKA YOU):
settings.intro: We're all trying to stay germ-free and hydrated this winter and these must-haves will help get the job done! Perfect for nurses, teachers or fellow mamas.

settings.title: For Your BFB (Best Friend's Baby)
settings.intro: All the new 2020 babes in your life deserve a little extra lovin' this Holiday season with the perfect skincare staples.

settings.title: For the Extra Festive Friend:
settings.intro: We all have that one friend who goes all in when it comes to the Holidays! Limited edition seasonal scents will make the perfect prezzie.

settings.title: 3 for $40!
settings.intro: For a limited time add any 3 of the below products to your cart and the total will automatically be adjusted to $40 at checkout!

settings.title: Community resource
settings.text: Providing donations to a wide variety of 501c3 charitable organizations recommended by our community.

settings.title: The Humble Village Project
settings.text: We've partnered with The Humble Village to provide critical nutrition, health, education and training for indigenous Mayan families living in rural Guatemala. Learn how you can help.

settings.title: Families for the win
settings.text: With our annual "Nominate a Tubby Todd Family" campaign, we gift a year of TT bathtime to 200 families in our community.

settings.title: Give Back
settings.intro: We believe that bubbles are for everyone and that's why we've committed to providing 15,000 families in need with bath and skincare essentials. We've partnered with Baby2Baby to help us accomplish our goal of spreading the sudsy love to the families that need it most.
settings.highlighted_text: Here are a few more ways we're giving back to TT fams:

settings.title: Refill
settings.text:
1. Just one gallon-sized Wash, Lotion or Bubble Bath refill is the equivalent of 16 8.5 oz bottles-helping to reduce the need to reorder, which reduces the amount of shipping and packaging required, too. 2,000 Gallon Jugs = 30,000 plastic bottles saved!

2. In Southern California? Come by The Tub Hub retail space to refill your Hair + Body Wash, Everyday Lotion and Bubble Bath. Save those bottles, Mama!

settings.title: Reduce & Recycle
settings.text:
1. This year we are working towards updating our core product line packaging by replacing virgin plastic with Post Consumer Recycled Plastic (PCR).

2. We are also excited to have launched our very first bar soap, Suds Stick! This plastic-free alternative to Hair + Body Wash will help to replace 10,000 8.5oz plastic bottles this year alone.

settings.title: Care for the OG Mama
settings.intro: From the beginning, Tubby Todd has been all about good, clean fun. This means we are passionate about creating products with the best clean ingredients for your little ones (and our own!). We are also dedicated to consciously improving our sustainability as a brand so we can do our best for Mama Earth. This year we're focused on reducing packaging waste. Here are a few steps we're taking to provide packaging solutions to create a more sustainable Tubby ecosystem.

settings.title: Celebrate Family
settings.intro: We believe that our differences are what make each and every TT fam special and unique. For this reason will continue to share stories and collaborations that feature and represent mamas and parents from all walks of life.
settings.highlighted_text: Get to know some of our faves:

settings.title:
Don‚Äôt Worry,
We‚Äôre Here to Help
settings.intro: If your little one suffers from sensitive or eczema-prone skin we recommend an easy 3-step skincare routine to keep baby's skin happy and hydrated.

settings.title: Name: Chandler K.
settings.text: I am so happy to have finally found a product I actually love and would highly recommend to others!

settings.title: Name: Leslie S.
settings.text: Tubby todd is the best. Save my little one's sensitive skin.

settings.title: Here's how it works:
settings.text:
Step 1: Wash with Tubby Todd Hair & Body Wash
Gently clean and condition skin during bath time with chamomile and echinacea extracts to add moisture instead of stripping it.


Step 2: Moisturize with Tubby Todd Everyday Lotion
The perfect base layer of hydration with moisturizing avocado oil and cocoa seed butter to hydrate skin.


Step 3: Seal in the moisture with Tubby Todd All-Over Ointment
All Over Ointment seals in allllll those yummy ingredients, perfect for spot-treating extra dry or eczema-prone areas.

settings.title: Don't Worry, Try Tubby
settings.text: We know you'll love our products as much as we do but if for any reason you‚Äôre not 100% satisfied with your purchase, don't worry! You can return your item for a full refund within 30 days of the delivery date.

settings.promise_description: We're passionate about making products that really work! Every product we make is not only gentle and safe for sensitive skin, but is impressively effective at getting the job done.

settings.title: Livin' la vida Lemon
settings.intro: Our fan-favorite Lemon Cr√®me scent is now available as an entire collection! Add some fresh squeezed fun to your summer skincare routine with Hair + Body Wash, Bubble Bath, Conditioner and Everyday Lotion in this deliciously citrusy scent with notes of fresh lemon and sweet vanilla. Simply the zest!

settings.title: Fresh-picked Skincare
settings.intro: Our Tubby Fruits collection is growing! Shop juicy skincare in delicious summer scents like Pear Blossom, Sweet Apple, Fresh Raspberry and Lemon Cr√®me to bring good, clean summer fun straight into your bathtime and skincare routines this season.

settings.text: One lucky winner will have their label design featured on a limited edition run of our Lavender and Rosemary Hair + Body Wash PLUS receive a year of bathtime ($500 in TT goodies!)

settings.text: Four runners up will have their artwork featured on The Mama Blog and Tubby Todd's social media pages, in addition to receiving $100 in Tubby Todd credit!

settings.title: How to Enter:
settings.text:
• Draw a space-themed bathtime scene!
  • Artist must be 10 years old or younger
  • Size 8.5 x 11‚Äù white paper
  • Use your phone to take a picture of the art
  • Fill out the form below and submit by June 8

settings.title: Tips:
settings.text:
• Use high contrast art supplies like markers or paint
  • Make sure to hold on to the artwork until we announce the winner! If your child wins we‚Äôll send instructions on how to submit a higher resolution image fit for print

settings.title: Details:

  • Submissions are due June 8
  • Winner will be announced June 11

settings.banner_text: Let's close out the year with a big, bubbly bang!!
settings.subtitle:
We will be gifting a year of bathtime ($200 value) to 200 (yes 200!!) families who have spread light, love and positivity in their communities this year.

Nominate a family below who deserves some special recognition and if your nomination is selected they'll win an entire year of bathtime ($200 value) AND we'll gift one to you as well!

settings.title: Fresh, creamy Coconut
settings.intro: Our perfect-for-summer Coconut scent is now available as an entire collection! Add some tropical fun to your summer bath and skincare routine with Hair + Body Wash, Bubble Bath, Conditioner and Everyday Lotion in this deliciously fresh scent with notes of creamy coconut, sweet vanilla and just a hint of juicy citrus.

settings.title: Give Back
settings.intro: We believe that bubbles are for everyone and that‚Äôs why we‚Äôve committed to providing 12,000 families in need with bath and skincare essentials. Since 2019, we‚Äôve partnered with Baby2Baby to help us accomplish our goal of spreading the sudsy love to the families that need it most.

settings.title: Celebrating our TT Families!
settings.banner_text:
We want to hear about your family's Tubby Todd story!

Tell us about your #1 favorite TT product, how long you've been using Tubby Todd and most importantly how you connect with your little ones through bathtime and skincare.
settings.subtitle: We'll select five entries to win a whole year of bathtime ($250 value)!

settings.title: Limited Edition
settings.intro: Freshen up your bathtime and skincare routines with limited edition and seasonal scents that your little one will love! These yummy smells won't be around for long so shop 'em before they're gone!
settings.title_2: TT x Leah Goren Bubble Bath
settings.outro_text: This extra bright and punchy scent will turn bathtime into a downright treat! With notes of juicy orange, tangy mango and just a hint of fresh coconut in three staple Tubby products, your little one will be soft, clean and smelling oh-so-good!

settings.title: New to Tubby Todd? Start Here!
settings.intro: Welcome to our beginner's guide‚Äîeverything you need to know to build the perfect Tubby Todd routine for your fam! Check out our favorite products for every age and every stage!
settings.highlight_text:
The Regulars Bundle is our 3-step solution to sensitive skin. We recommend it for all families and all ages‚Äîthe perfect starting point for your little one's skincare routine!

Step 1. Clean and condition with Hair + Body Wash

Step 2. Give a good base layer of hydration with Everyday Lotion

Step 3. Spot treat extra dry areas with All Over Ointment

settings.quote: "Don‚Äôt be afraid of criticism. Put yourself out there. Be different and celebrate those differences. Take risks"

settings.title: You're doing a great job, Mama!
Did you know that hydration starts in the bath?!
settings.text: Using moisturizer is important of course, but we fill our Hair + Body Wash and Bubble Bath with ingredients that actually hydrate while they gently clean, leaving skin perfectly prepped for Lotion and Ointment!

Good, Clean Fun: The Tubby Todd Promise

settings.text:
Hi, we‚Äôre Tubby Todd! A family-owned skincare brand for little ones and their fams. Our goal is to bring you gentle, clean and effective skincare staples that are great for sensitive or eczema-prone skin that you‚Äôll love to reach for every single day. We‚Äôre passionate about ingredients and know that as mamas, dads and caretakers we only want the absolute best for our babes.

‚Äî Co-founders, Brian + Andrea

settings.banner_text:
We created Tubby Todd as a solution to our own family‚Äôs sensitive skin.

Here's a bit more about what that means to us

settings.title: Good
settings.text: Our products are: ‚Ä¢ Dermatologist and Pediatrician tested ‚Ä¢ Hypoallergenic ‚Ä¢ Clinically Tested ‚Ä¢ Made as safe as possible

settings.title: Clean
settings.text: We NEVER use: Parabens, SLS/SLES, Silicones, Phthalates or Synthetic Fragrances. Our products are ALWAYS: Gluten, Dairy and Animal Cruelty Free. Here‚Äôs a detailed list of all of our ingredients - Check it out!

settings.title: Fun
settings.text: Before we release a new product we test it in our own home, on our 4 little ones to make sure we really, truly love it! No really, we would never release a product that isn‚Äôt a must-have staple in our own lives. We want every single product in our line to be effective and also fun to use.

settings.title: All About Fragrance Free
settings.intro: For the most sensitive babes‚Äîtry Tubby Todd Fragrance-free! Same great formulas, minus the scent. Check out our FF options below!

settings.title: SPF for Sensitive Skin
settings.intro: The Sun Sets are perfectly paired products for all your babe's skincare needs before, during and after sun‚Äîall bundled together with a 10% discount!

settings.title: Ingredients
settings.content:
[ingredients]

‚Äî

View Tubby Todd Ingredient Chart.

settings.title: FAQs
settings.content: [faq]

settings.title: Our Worry-Free Guarantee
settings.content:
Our guarantee is simple and straightforward: We want you to love our products as much as we do. If you‚Äôre not 100% satisfied with your purchase, don't worry! Just reach out to us and we'll make it right.

Learn more.

settings.text_newsletter: Notify me when this product is available:

settings.title: The return of Fresh Raspberry
settings.intro: Back by popular demand, our Fresh Raspberry scent is bright and sweet with notes of red raspberry and just a hint of a zesty lemon. Shop the entire collection for a berry fun bathtime and skincare refresh.

settings.title: Welcome to Tubby TV!
settings.intro: Get to know the TT brand with all the latest news on product launches, Tubby tips, bubbly BTS and more. Tune in live or catch up below so you don't miss a second of the good, clean fun!

settings.title: The Regulars 3-step Solution to Sensitive Skin
settings.intro: Is your babe struggling with dryness, sensitivity or eczema-prone skin? We've got you covered! Check out the vid below where Tubby Todd co-founder and Head Mama Andrea Faulkner Williams will walk you through our 3-step Solution to Sensitive Skin featuring The Regulars Bundle!

settings.title: Ready to try the Regs? Receive your free shipping code!
Label Design Contest!
settings.banner_text:
Win a year of bath time by
creating our next label!
settings.subtitle: One lucky kiddo's art will be featured on a limited edition bottle of Tubby Todd Bubble Bath!

settings.title: Entry Requirements
settings.text:
• Draw a scene that features The Perfect Day
  • Size: 8.5x11"
  • Artist must be 10 years old or younger

settings.title: Tips
settings.text:
• Use high-contrast art supplies like markers or paint (vs. pencils) to make sure the art stands out.
  • Don't worry about the orientation or how the art will fit on our current labels. We'll make sure the winner's art looks awesome on the label!

settings.title: Grand Prize
settings.text: One lucky winner will have their label design featured on a limited edition run of our Watermelon Bubble Bath PLUS receive a year of bathtime ($250 in TT goodies!)

settings.title: Runners-Up
settings.text: Four winners will have their artwork featured on The Mama Blog and Tubby Todd's social media pages, in addition to receiving $100 in Tubby Todd credit!

settings.title: Details:
settings.text:
• Follow above entry requirements
  • Use your phone to take a picture of the art
  • Fill out the form by June 7th
  • Make sure to hold on to the art until we announce the winner! If your child wins, we'll instruct you on how to submit a high-resolution image for print.

settings.title: Let's Celebrate Tubby Todd Dads!
settings.banner_text: We're all about the mamas all year long so for Father's Day we wanted to shine a big, bubbly spotlight on all the incredible #tubbytodddads!
settings.subtitle:
We want to hear about your special TT Dad and everything that makes him the absolute best. Tell us a funny story, how he helps out at bathtime, what you or your kiddos call him as a fun nickname or anything else that you want to share!

We'll select five dads to feature and share their stories for Father's Day. Our featured dads will also win a $150 Tubby Todd credit! Fill out the form below to enter, and don't forget to upload a photo too!

settings.title: A Message from Andrea
settings.text:
"Earlier this year I went to Guatemala with The Humble Village Project to meet with the Naruguate team and learn about how they are helping indigenous Mayan families with healthcare, education and training. It was a trip that changed my life. Brian and I immediately starting working on how to make donating to The Humble Village Project part of our charitable giving plan at Tubby Todd. I'm so excited to share that we've been able to give $15,000 to support their mission and ours of connecting families."

xx
Andrea

settings.title: Give Back
settings.text:
Help us support Humble Village, a 501-c3 nonprofit organization working with indigenous Guatemalan families living in extreme poverty. Humble Village provides healthcare, education and training to remote regions where little to no services are currently provided to help drastically improve their quality of living and ability to thrive.

Learn more about the incredible impact this organization has within their community and find out how you can join us in supporting them at thehumblevillageproject.org

settings.title: Tubby Cares
settings.content: We believe that bubbles are for everyone and that's why we've committed to providing families in need with bath and skincare essentials. Learn more about our commitment and how else we give back.

settings.subtitle: Send your shower deets below and we'll send you a special surprise from all of us at team TT to celebrate you and your little one on your special day!

settings.title: Sweet Moments
settings.text: We love connecting with little ones during bathtime while screens are put away and it's just you and babe! Try new Sweet Apple Hair + Body Wash and Everyday Lotion as a special treat for the whole fam.

settings.title: Tubby Todd x World of Eric Carle
settings.intro: Welcome to a wonderful world of imagination! Bring the magic of one of our all-time favorite children's stories to you! Bath time and skincare routine with our newest collab featuring illustrations from The Very Hungry Caterpillar
